00024 /* function u_ShowDossier
00025  * Purpose :  Show all the available folder 
00026  *            for the users
00027  * parm : 
00028  *      - $p_user user login
00029  *      - $p_admin 1 if admin
00030  * gen :
00031  *      - none
00032  * return:
00033  *      - nothing
00034  *
00035  */ 
00036 function u_ShowDossier($p_user,$p_admin)
00037 {
00038   $p_array=GetAvailableFolder($p_user,$p_admin);   
00039   if ( $p_array == 0 ) return " * Aucun dossier *";
00040   $result="";
00041   $result.="<table>";
00042   $result.='<TR>';
00043     if ( $p_admin == 1 ) {
00044       $result.="<TD><A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"admin_repo.php\"> Administration : </A></TD>";
00045     }
00046     $result.='<TD><A HREF="logout.php" CLASS="mtitle">: Sortir</a></TD>';
00047     $result.="</TR>";
00048   $result.="</table>";
00049   $result.="<TABLE>";
00050   for ($i=0;$i<sizeof($p_array);$i++) {
00051     $id=$p_array[$i]['dos_id'];
00052     $name= $p_array[$i]['dos_name'];
00053     $desc=$p_array[$i]['dos_description'];
00054     if ( $i%2 == 0) 
00055       $tr="odd";
00056     else $tr="even";
00057 
00058     $result.="<TR class=\"$tr\"><TD class=\"$tr\">";
00059     $result.=$id."  <B>$name</B>";
00060     $result.="</TD><TD class=\"$tr\">";
00061     $result.=$desc;
00062     $result.="</TD><TD class=\"mtitle\">";
00063     $result.="<A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"user_compta.php?dos=$id\">Comptabilité</A>";
00064     $result.="</TD>";
00065     $result.="<TD class=\"mtitle\">";
00066     $result.="<A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"commercial.php?dos=$id\">Commercial</A>";
00067     $result.="</TD>";
00068     $result.="<TD class=\"mtitle\">";
00069     $result.="<A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"facturation.php?dos=$id\">Facturation</A>";
00070     $result.="</TD>";
00071     $result.="<TD class=\"mtitle\">";
00072     $result.="<A class=\"mtitle\" HREF=\"parametre.php?dos=$id\">Paramètres</A>";
00073     $result.="</TD>";
00074 
00075     $result.="</TR>";
00076   }
00077   $result.="</TABLE>";
00078   return $result;
00079 }
00080 /* function GetAvailableFolder
00081  * Purpose :  Get all the available folders
00082  *            for the users
00083  * parm : 
00084  *      - $p_user user login
00085  *      - $p_admin 1 if admin
00086  * gen :
00087  *      - none
00088  * return:
00089  *      - array containing ac_dossier.dos_id
00090  *                         ac_dossier.dos_name
00091  *                         ac_dossier.dos_description
00092  *
00093  */ 
00094 function GetAvailableFolder($p_user,$p_admin)
00095 {
00096   $filter="";
00097   if ($p_admin==0) {
00098     // show only available folders
00099     // if user is not an admin
00100     $sql="select distinct dos_id,dos_name,dos_description from ac_users 
00101                   natural join jnt_use_dos 
00102                   natural join  ac_dossier 
00103                   join  priv_user on ( priv_jnt=jnt_id)
00104           where use_active=1 
00105          and use_login='$p_user' 
00106          and priv_priv != 'NO' ";
00107 
00108   } else {
00109     $sql="select distinct dos_id,dos_name,dos_description from ac_users 
00110                   natural join jnt_use_dos 
00111                   natural join  ac_dossier 
00112       where  use_active=1 ";
00113   }
00114   include_once("postgres.php");
00115   $cn=DbConnect();
00116   $Res=ExecSql($cn,$sql);
00117   $max=pg_numRows($Res);
00118   if ( $max == 0 ) return 0;
00119 
00120   for ($i=0;$i<$max;$i++) {
00121     $array[]=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00122   }
00123   return $array;
00124 }
00125 /* function u_ShowMenu
00126  * Purpose : Show The login menu
00127  * 
00128  * parm : 
00129  *      - $p_admin 1 if admin
00130  *      - $p_item item to add 
00131  * gen :
00132  *      - none
00133  * return:
00134  *      - nothing
00135  *
00136  */ 
00137   function u_ShowMenu($p_admin,$p_check = 1,$p_item="")
00138 {
00139   /* $p_check == 1 si test sur Admin */
00140   include_once("postgres.php");
00141   echo '<div class="mtitle">';
00142   echo "<TABLE align=center cellspadding=0><TR>";
00143   if ( $p_admin !=0 ) {
00144       /* Administrator Menu */
00145       echo '<TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF=admin_repo.php>Administrator Menu</A></TD>';
00146     } 
00147 
00148   if (strlen ( $p_item ) != 0 ) {
00149     echo '<TD class="mtitle">'.$p_item.'</A></TD>';
00150   }
00151   
00152   echo ' <TD class="mtitle"> <A class="mtitle" HREF="user_pref.php">Préférence</A></TD>';
00153 
00154   echo "<TD class=\"mtitle\">"; 
00155   html_button_logout();
00156   echo "</TD>";
00157   echo "</TR></TABLE>";
00158   echo "</div>";
00159 }
00160 /* function u_ShowMenuCompta 
00161  * purpose : show the top menu for 
00162  *           the user profile
00163  * parm : p_dossier
00164  *
00165  * return: none
00166  *
00167  * gen : none
00168  */
00169 function ShowMenuCompta($p_dossier)
00170 {
00171   include_once("postgres.php");
00172   //  $l_name=GetDossierName($p_dossier);
00173   // find our current menu
00174   $default=basename($_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']);
00175   switch ($default) {
00176   case "user_jrn.php":
00177     $default.="?show";
00178     break;
00179   case "recherche.php":
00180     $default.="?p_dossier=$p_dossier";
00181     break;
00182   case "fiche.php":
00183     $default.="?p_dossier=$p_dossier";
00184     break;
00185   }
00186 
00187   $p_array=array(array("user_jrn.php?show","Journaux","Les journaux permettent d'encoder toutes les opérations"),
00188                  array("recherche.php?p_dossier=$p_dossier","Recherche","Pour retrouver une opération"),
00189                  array("fiche.php?p_dossier=$p_dossier","Fiche","Ajouter, modifier ou effacer des fiches"),
00190                  array("user_impress.php","Impression","Impression"),
00191                  array("user_advanced.php","Avancé","Opérations délicates"),
00192                  //              array("dossier_prefs.php","Paramètre"),
00193                  array('user_pref.php','Preference',"Préférence de l'utilisateur"),
00194                  array('login.php','Accueil',"Accueil"),
00195                  array('logout.php','logout',"Sortie")
00196                  );
00197 
00198   $result=ShowItem($p_array,'H',"mtitle","mtitle",$default,' width="100%"');
00199 
00200   $r="<H2 class=\"info\">Comptabilit&eacute;  ".$_SESSION['g_name']." </H2>";
00201   $r.=$result;
00202   return $r;
00203 
00204 
00205 
00206 
00207 }

00209 /* function ShowMenuJrnUser($p_dossier,$p_user)
00210  * Purpose : Show the Menu from the jrn encode
00211  *           page
00212  * 
00213  * parm : 
00214  *      - $p_dossier
00215  *      - $p_user

00218  * gen :
00219  *      - none
00220  * return:
00221  *      - none
00222  *

00224 
00225 function GetFirstJrnIdForJrnType($p_dossier,$p_type)
00226 {
00227   include_once("postgres.php");
00228   
00229   //get db connection
00230   $Cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);  
00231   //execute query: select min(jrn_def_id) from jrn_def where jrn_def_type='$jrn_type'
00232   $Ret=ExecSql($Cn,"select min(jrn_def_id) from jrn_def where jrn_def_type='".$p_type."';");
00233   $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Ret,0);
00234   return $l_line[0];
00235   //return 0;
00236 }
00237  /* function ShowMenuJrnUser
00238  **************************************************
00239  * Purpose : 
00240  *        
00241  * parm : 
00242  *      - dossier, type and jrn
00243  * gen :
00244  *      -
00245  * return:
00246  */
00247 function ShowMenuJrnUser($p_dossier,$p_type,$p_jrn)
00248 {
00249   include_once ("debug.php");
00250   include_once("constant.php");
00251   include_once("class_user.php");
00252   echo_debug('user_menu.php',__LINE__,"U_SHOWMENUJRNUSER PTYPE=$p_type");
00253   //    echo '<div class="searchmenu">';
00254   echo '<TABLE><TR>';
00255   include_once("postgres.php");
00256   
00257   
00258   $Cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00259   
00260   $User=new cl_user($Cn);
00261   $User->Check();
00262   if ( $User->Admin() ==0) {
00263     $Ret=ExecSql($Cn,"select jrn_def_id,jrn_def_type,jrn_def_name,jrn_def_class_deb,jrn_def_class_cred,jrn_type_id,jrn_desc,uj_priv,
00264                                jrn_deb_max_line,jrn_cred_max_line
00265                              from jrn_def join jrn_type on jrn_def_type=jrn_type_id
00266                              join user_sec_jrn on uj_jrn_id=jrn_def_id 
00267                              where
00268                              uj_login='".$User->id."'
00269                              and uj_priv !='X'
00270                              and jrn_def_type='$p_type'
00271                              ");
00272     } else {
00273       $Ret=ExecSql($Cn,"select jrn_def_id,jrn_def_type,jrn_def_name,jrn_def_class_deb,jrn_def_class_cred,jrn_deb_max_line,jrn_cred_max_line,
00274                             jrn_type_id,jrn_desc,'W' as uj_priv
00275                              from jrn_def join jrn_type on jrn_def_type=jrn_type_id where
00276                               jrn_def_type='$p_type'");
00277 
00278     } 
00279     $Max=pg_NumRows($Ret);
00280     include_once("check_priv.php");
00281 
00282     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00283       $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00284       // Admin have always rights
00285       if ( $User->Admin() == 0 ){
00286         $right=CheckJrn($p_dossier,$_SESSION['g_user'],$l_line['jrn_def_id']);
00287       }else {
00288         $right=3;
00289       }
00290 
00291       if ( $right > 0 ) {
00292         // Minimum Lecture 
00293         echo_debug('user_menu.php',__LINE__,"p_jrn = $p_jrn ");
00294         if ( $l_line['jrn_def_id'] != $p_jrn ) {
00295           echo '<TD class="cell">';
00296           printf ('<A class="mtitle" HREF="user_jrn.php?jrn_type=%s&p_jrn=%s">%s</A></TD>',
00297                   $l_line['jrn_def_type'],
00298                   $l_line['jrn_def_id'],
00299                   $l_line['jrn_def_name']
00300                   );
00301         } else
00302           {
00303             echo '<TD class="selectedcell">'. $l_line['jrn_def_name'].'</TD>';
00304           }
00305       }// if right
00306     }// for
00307     echo '</TR>';
00308     echo "</TABLE>";
00309     //echo '</div>';
00310 
00311 }
00312 /* function ShowMenuJrn
00313  * Purpose : Show the menu of the jrn depending of its type
00314  *        
00315  * parm : 
00316  *      - p_cn database connection
00317  *      - p_dossier
00318  *      - p_UserProperty
00319  *      - p_jrn_type
00320  *      - p_jrn
00321  * gen :
00322  *      - none
00323  * return:
00324  *     - string containing the menu
00325  */
00326 function ShowMenuJrn($p_cn,$p_jrn_type,$p_jrn) 
00327 {
00328 
00329   $Res=ExecSql($p_cn,"select ja_name,ja_url,ja_action,ja_desc from jrn_action  where ja_jrn_type='$p_jrn_type'
00330                       order by ja_id");
00331   $num=pg_NumRows($Res);
00332   if ($num==0)    return "";
00333   // Retrieve in the database the menu
00334   $ret="<TABLE>";
00335   $access_key_list = array();
00336   for ($i=0;$i<$num;$i++) {
00337     $action=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00338     $access_key=get_quick_key($action['ja_name'],$access_key_list);
00339     $lib=str_replace($access_key,'<u>'.$access_key.'</u>',$action['ja_name']);
00340 
00341     $ret.=sprintf('<TR><TD class="cell"><A class="mtitle" accesskey="%s" title="%s" '.
00342                   'HREF="%s?%s&p_jrn=%s&jrn_type=%s">%s</A></td></tR>',
00343                   $access_key, 
00344                   $action['ja_desc'], 
00345                   $action['ja_url'],
00346                   $action['ja_action'], 
00347                   $p_jrn, 
00348                   $_REQUEST['jrn_type'],
00349                   $lib);
00350 
00351   }
00352   $ret.='</TABLE>';
00353   return $ret;
00354 
00355 }
00356 
00357 /* function get_quick_key
00358  * Purpose : Show the menu of the jrn depending of its type
00359  *  return a not yet used access key. The returned key is added to $access_key_list       
00360  * parm : 
00361  *      - $title
00362  *      - &$access_key_list
00363  * gen :
00364  *      - none
00365  * return:
00366  *     - string containing the menu
00367  */
00368 function get_quick_key($title,&$access_key_list)
00369 {
00370         $quick = $title[0];
00371         if(array_key_exists($quick, $access_key_list))
00372         {
00373                 echo_debug(" key exists: " . $quick);
00374                 return get_quick_key(substr($title, 1), $access_key_list);
00375         } else
00376         {
00377                 echo_debug(" new key: " . $quick);
00378         }
00379         $access_key_list[$quick] = $quick;
00380         //var_dump($access_key_list);
00381         return $quick;
00382 }

00397 
00398 function u_ShowMenuRecherche($p_cn,$p_jrn,$p_sessid,$p_array=null)
00399 {
00400   echo_debug('user_menu.php',__LINE__,"u_ShowMenuRecherche($p_cn,$p_array)");
00401   if ( $p_array != null ) {
00402     foreach ( $p_array as $key=> $element) {
00403       ${"p_$key"}=$element;
00404       echo_debug('user_menu.php',__LINE__,"p_$key =$element;");
00405     }
00406   }
00407 
00408   // Find the journal property
00409   //  $JrnProperty=GetJrnProperty($p_cn,$p_jrn);
00410 
00411   $opt='<OPTION VALUE="="> =';
00412   $opt.='<OPTION VALUE="<="> <=';
00413   $opt.='<OPTION VALUE="<"> <';
00414   $opt.='<OPTION VALUE=">"> >';
00415   $opt.='<OPTION VALUE=">="> >=';
00416   if ( ! isset ($p_date_start)) $p_date_start="";
00417   if ( ! isset ($p_date_end))   $p_date_end="";
00418   if ( ! isset ($p_mont_sel))$p_mont_sel="";
00419   if ( ! isset ($p_s_comment))$p_s_comment="";
00420   if ( ! isset ($p_s_montant)) $p_s_montant="";
00421   if ( ! isset ($p_s_internal)) $p_s_internal="";
00422   if ( ! isset ($p_poste)) $p_poste="";
00423   if ( ! isset ($p_qcode)) $p_qcode="";
00424 
00425 
00426   if ( $p_mont_sel != "" )  $opt.='<OPTION value="'.$p_mont_sel.'" SELECTED> '.$p_mont_sel;
00427   $r="";
00428  
00429   //  $r.= '<div style="border-style:outset;border-width:1pt;">';
00430 
00431   $r.=JS_SEARCH_POSTE;
00432   $r.= "<B>Recherche</B>";
00433   $r.= '<FORM ACTION="recherche.php" METHOD="GET">';
00434   $r.="<table><tr><TD>";  
00435   $r.= '<TABLE>';
00436   $r.= "<TR>";
00437   $r.= '<TD COLSPAN="3">  Date compris entre</TD> ';
00438   $r.= "</TR> <TR>";
00439   $r.= '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="date_start" SIZE="10" VALUE="'.$p_date_start.'"></TD>';
00440   $r.= '<TD> <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="date_end" size="10" Value="'.$p_date_end.'"></TD>';
00441   $r.= '</TD><TD>';
00442   $r.= "</TR> <TR>";
00443   $r.= "<TD> Montant ";
00444   $r.= ' <SELECT NAME="mont_sel">'.$opt.' </SELECT></TD><TD>';
00445   $r.= ' <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="s_montant" SIZE="10" VALUE="'.$p_s_montant.'"></TD>';
00446   $r.= "</TR><TR>";
00447   $r.="<TD> Internal code</td>";
00448   $r.='<TD><input type="text" name="s_internal" value="'.$p_s_internal.'"></td>';
00449 
00450   $r.="</TD></TR></TABLE></td><TD><table>";
00451 
00452   $r.= "</TR>";
00453   $r.= "<TR>";
00454   $W=new widget("js_search_poste");
00455   $W->label="Numéro de poste";
00456   $W->name="poste";
00457   $W->value=$p_poste;
00458   $r.="<TR>".$W->IOValue();
00459   $r.= "</TR>";
00460   $r.= "<TR>";
00461   $A=new widget("TEXT");
00462   $A->label="Quick Code";
00463   $A->name="qcode";
00464   $A->value=$p_qcode;
00465   $r.="<TD> Quick Code</TD><TD>".$A->IOValue()."</TD>";
00466   $r.= "</TR>";
00467 
00468 
00469   $r.= '<TD colspan="3"> Le commentaire contient </TD>';
00470   $r.= "</TR><TR>";
00471   $r.= '<TD COLSPAN="3"> <INPUT TYPE="TEXT" NAME="s_comment" VALUE="'.$p_s_comment.'"></TD>';
00472   $r.= "</TR><TR>";
00473   $r.= '<TD COLSPAN="3"><INPUT TYPE="SUBMIT" VALUE="Recherche" NAME="viewsearch"></TD>';
00474   $r.= "</TR>";
00475   $r.= "</TABLE>";
00476   $r.="</TR></TABLE>";
00477   $r.= "</FORM>";
00478 
00479 
00480   return $r;
00481 
00482 }

00520 function ShowJrn($p_menu="")

00534 /* function ShowMenuFiche
00535  **************************************************
00536  * Purpose : 
00537  *        
00538  * parm : 
00539  *      -
00540  * gen :
00541  *      -
00542  * return:
00543  */
00544 function ShowMenuFiche($p_dossier)
00545 {
00546      $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00547      echo '<div class="lmenu">';
00548      echo '<TABLE>';
00549  // TODO
00550  // Only for developper
00551  // A test must be added
00552      echo '<TR><TD colspan="3" class="mtitle">
00553           <A class="mtitle" HREF="fiche.php?action=add_modele&fiche=modele">Creation</A></TD></TR>';
00554      $Res=ExecSql($cn,"select fd_id,fd_label from fiche_def order by fd_label");
00555      $Max=pg_NumRows($Res);
00556      for ( $i=0; $i < $Max;$i++) {
00557        $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Res,$i);
00558        printf('<TR><TD class="cell">%s</TD><TD class="mshort"><A class="mtitle" HREF="fiche.php?action=vue&fiche=%d">Voir</A>
00559                </TD>
00560                <TD class="mshort"><A class="mtitle" HREF="fiche.php?action=modifier&fiche=%d">Modifier</A></TD>
00561                </TR>',
00562             $l_line['fd_label'],
00563             $l_line['fd_id'],
00564             $l_line['fd_id']);
00565      }
00566      echo "</TABLE>";
00567      echo '</div>';
00568 }

00635 /* function  MenuJrn($p_dossier)
00636  * Purpose : Show the menu in the jrn page
00637  * 
00638  * parm : 
00639  *      - $p_dossier 
00640  * gen :
00641  *      - none
00642  * return:
00643  *      - none
00644  *
00645  */ 
00646 
00647 function MenuJrn($p_dossier)
00648 {
00649     echo '<TABLE>';
00650     echo '<TR><TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF="jrn_add.php">Création </A></TD></TR>';
00651     include_once("postgres.php");
00652     $Cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00653     $Ret=ExecSql($Cn,"select jrn_def_id,jrn_def_name,
00654                              jrn_def_class_deb,jrn_def_class_cred,jrn_type_id,jrn_desc 
00655                              from jrn_def join jrn_type on jrn_def_type=jrn_type_id");
00656     $Max=pg_NumRows($Ret);
00657     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00658       $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00659       printf ('<TR><TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF="jrn_detail.php?p_jrn=%s">%s</A></TD></TR>',
00660               $l_line['jrn_def_id'],$l_line['jrn_def_name']);
00661 
00662     }
00663     echo "</TABLE>";
00664 }

00689 /* function
00690  * Purpose :
00691  * 
00692  * parm : 
00693  *      - 
00694  * gen :
00695  *      -
00696  * return:
00697  *      -
00698  *
00699  */ 
00700 function ShowMenuComptaForm($p_dossier) {
00701      $cn=DbConnect($p_dossier);
00702     echo '<div class="lmenu">';
00703     echo '<TABLE>';
00704     echo '<TR><TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF="form.php?action=add">Ajout</A></TD></TR>';
00705     $Ret=ExecSql($cn,"select fr_id, fr_label 
00706                              from formdef order by fr_label");
00707     $Max=pg_NumRows($Ret);
00708     for ($i=0;$i<$Max;$i++) {
00709       $l_line=pg_fetch_array($Ret,$i);
00710       printf ('<TR><TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF="form.php?action=view&fr_id=%s">%s</A></TD></TR>',
00711               $l_line['fr_id'],$l_line['fr_label']);
00712 
00713     }
00714     echo "</TABLE>";
00715     echo '</div>';
00716 }

00721     echo '<TR><TD class="mtitle"><A class="mtitle" HREF="import.php?action=transfer">Transfert CSV</A></TD></TR>';
00722     
00723     echo "</TABLE>";
00724 }
